data.title: Cho Hyun
data.meta_description: #50 Cho Hyun-sang on the 2024 Korea's 50 Richest - Cho Hyun-sang is the youngest of three sons of Cho Seok-rae, the late former chairman of Hyosung. He
data.text:
2024 Toronto International Film Festival Features Korean Films

The films include 'K-POPS,' 'I, The Executioner,' 'Love in the Big City,' 'Harbin,' and the documentary 'The Last of the Sea Women.'

Who Sang 'My Way' At The Olympics? What To Know

French singer Yseult interpreted ''My Way'' during the closing ceremony of the Paris 2024 Olympic Games, last Sunday.

KCON LA 2024 Brings Kdrama Stars; Plus, KCON Germany And MAMA Awards

Actors Kim Soo-hyun, Park Min-young and Rowoon and legendary artists like g.o.d and Tiger JK were among the diverse roster of celebrities attending this year's KCON LA.

Despite 3 Strikes Against Her, Comedian Margaret Cho Is More Outrageous Than Ever

The two sides of the delicious and outrageous Margaret Cho and what she has to share with all of us who are seeking peace of mind from stress and burnout.

Yeon Sang-Ho Latest Korean Director To Helm English Language Film

Yeon's first English language film will be co-produced by his company Wow Point and Leonardo DiCaprio's company Appian Way Productions.

(UPDATE): NCT 127, Rowoon, Kim Soo Hyun Announced For KCON LA 2024, More Exciting Events Planned

BOYNEXTDOOR, Jeon Somi, Kep1er, STAYC and g.o.d will join ENHYPEN, P1Harmony and other K-pop artists at KCON LA 2024. Other major artists to be revealed soon!

Serpentine Pavilion 2024 By Architect Minsuk Cho Imagined As Islands Of Experiences

Serpentine Pavilion 2024 "Archipelagic Void" by Korean architect Minsuk Cho and Mass Studies is designed as islands of experiences clustered together in Kensington Gardens.

Hong Sang-Soo’s Sunny Film ‘In Our Day’ To Screen At Lincoln Center

Hong's latest film 'In Our Day' suggests the meaning of life may be found in small moments and simple interactions.

Chemicals Tycoon Debuts On Korea’s Wealth Ranking As Semiconductor Demand Surges

Chung Ji-wan’s company, Soulbrain, makes chemicals needed in the semiconductor-manufacturing process.

Cho Jung-Seok Bears The Weight Of The Crown In ‘Captivating The King’

Cho Jung-seok finds that his 'Captivating The King' character has some commendable personality traits.

Terre Et Sang Winery Bottles The Essence Of Santa Barbara

Rising stars Duncan and Dalita Harmon, who founded the winery in 2019, now have a tasting room in Los Olivos.

Singapore’s Billionaire Banking Stalwart, Wee Cho Yaw, Dies At 95

Singapore billionaire banker and property developer Wee Cho Yaw died on Saturday morning at the age of 95.

Tycoon Wee Cho Yaw’s UOL Submits Top Bid For Prime Singapore Site

Billionaire Wee Cho Yaw's UOL Group and its unit Singapore Land submitted the top bid of $320 million for a prime residential plot in the Orchard Road shopping belt.

Hong Sang-Soo’s 29th Film ‘In Water’ To Air In New York City

The novice director in the film 'In Water' tells his friends he wants to make films for the honors.

Billionaire Wee Cho Yaw’s UOL Sells Over Half Of Singapore Residential Project During Weekend Preview

UOL Group and its unit Singapore Land sold more than half of its residential project during a private preview on Saturday in the upscale Bukit Timah enclave in the western central region of the city-state, adding to signs of resilient housing demand in the country.
